data.eml:eml: Plectotropis yonganensis sp. nov. (Gastropoda: Bradybaenidae) from China, with revision of two Chinese camaenid species (Gastropoda: Camaenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Wei-Chuan, Xiao, Qiong, Chen, De-Niu, Hwang, Chung-Chi (2011): Plectotropis yonganensis sp. nov. (Gastropoda: Bradybaenidae) from China, with revision of two Chinese camaenid species (Gastropoda: Camaenidae). Zootaxa 2929: 51-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.204632
